name: Life on Cloud Farms
description:
Try and get all the sheep into the pens with your loyal companion shep. Make sure you close the pens to turn the sheep into clouds.

REQUIRES GAMEPAD

Controls:

  • Left Stick: Dog movement
  • Right Stick: Farmer Movement
  • A: Dog Jump
  • B / Right Stick Press / Right Trigger Press: Farmer Jump

Objectives:

  1. Herd sheep into pens
  2. Walk farmer into gate to close
  3. ???
  4. Repeat Steps 1-3
